DOC.brief_summary: Background : Non-specific neck pain ( NS-NP ) characterize pain structure locate region superior nuchal line spinal process first thoracic vertebra , without association specific systemic disease provide multifactorial and/or little known cause . Objective : The objective present study verify clinical effect MV visceral nociceptive inhibition NS-NP patient functional dyspepsia . Methods : In study sixty NS-NP patient functional dyspepsia ( age : 18 50 year ) randomize two group : visceral manipulation group ( VMG ) ( n =30 ) control group ( CG ) ( n =30 ) . The VMG treat visceral manipulation stomach liver wile CG receive placebo treatment . The immediate effect 7 day treatment evaluate pain , cervical range , electromyographic activity upper trapezius .
DOC.brief_title: Visceral Manipulation Treatment Patients With Non-specific Neck Pain With Functional Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: history neck pain minimal period three month ; neck restrict movement ( active passive ) least one direction ; Neck Disability Index consider score range 1124 ( score 50 ) ; numerical rating scale ( NRS ) perceive pain intensity consider 37 point 11point ; Presence symptom related functional dyspepsia , accord Rome III diagnostic criterion : uncomfortable postprandial fullness , early satiety , epigastric pain epigastric burning , accompany evidence structural disease capable explaining symptom . Individuals history neurological disorder ( i.e. , irradiate pain ) neck surgery ; systemic disease ; connective tissue disorder herniated disc ; current pregnancy ; medical diagnosis fibromyalgia ; physical therapy treatment , massage , acupuncture previous two week ; use analgesic , muscle relaxant , psychotropic agent , antiinflammatory agent previous three day ; chronic neck pain result traumatic incident ; chronic musculoskeletal condition ( e.g. , muscular disorder , polyarthritis ) .
